headline.main: Family Meals Called Key To Helping Obese Child

docs.lead_paragraph: FOR the overweight child, home should be a refuge from the taunts and gibes of the outside world. Instead of being nagged, bribed, threatened, ridiculed, spied upon and singled out for special mealtime curbs, he should be helped by intelligent menu planning for the entire family.
